name: FACT OR WACK video games
description:
Trivia with a video game Twist! FACT OR WACK video games is the ultimate time attack trivia game with some surprises thrown in. Twelve challenging and hilarious levels with tons of questions.Try your best to ace every question on each level while racing against the timer. Try to tackle a huge variety of game questions from classic video games all the way up to the present hits. To pass a level you have to get 100% and beat the timer. If you're fast and smart you just might survive!!!!
Check out the Original Fact or Wack as well!
On iOS App store and Mac App store.
